results.name: If n is even then a(n) = n!/( 2^(n/2)*(n/2)! ), otherwise a(n) = n!/( 3*2^((n-1)/2)*((n-3)/2)! ).

formula: a(n+1) = a(n)*n*(n+1)/6 if n is even, a(n+1) = 6*a(n)/(n-1) if n is odd. - _Chai Wah Wu_, Jul 15 2015
program: (PARI) main(size)={v=vector(size);for(n=2, size+1, if(n%2==0, v[n-1]=n!/(2^(n/2)*(n/2)!), v[n-1]=n!/( 3*2^((n-1)/2)*((n-3)/2)!))); return(v);} /* _Anders Hellström_, Jul 10 2015 */
